data.title: Little League Baseball and Softball
data.meta_description: Founded in 1939, Little League Baseball and Softball is the world’s largest organized youth sports program, with millions of players and more than one million adult volunteers in every U.S. state and more than 80 other countries.
data.text: The 2024 Little League Baseball® World Series, Presented by T-Mobile, is quickly shaping up to be a series that fans will not want to miss. Now is your chance to come out and experience history in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, the home of the world’s largest youth sports tournament from August 14 – 25.
